Diagnosis: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE) with Secondary Immune Thrombocytopenia Justification: Autoimmune condition can cause thrombocytopenia with bleeding signs; requires systemic features for suspicion but often presents with hematologic abnormalities.  10.
